sec.label: C.2.4.3
sec.title: Percussive mobile rigs (percussive and rotary-percussive)
sec.p: For percussive rigs, the major source of noise is the percussive drill itself and the drill steel. Therefore, during the noise emission tests, the rig shall drill in rock or in a concrete block at rated performance level.
The drill bit shall be drilled at least 0,1Â m into the rock or concrete before the measurement starts.
